titles.title: To designate the current and future Department of Veterans Affairs Medical Center in Louisville, Kentucky, as the "Robley Rex Department of Veterans Affairs Medical Center".

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

bill.summary: 7/23/2009--Introduced. Designates the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA) Medical Center in Louisville, Kentucky, and any successor to such medical center, as the "Robley Rex Department of Veterans Affairs Medical Center."
